translations: adv.凄凉地，悲哀地：以一种悲伤或凄凉的方式。
· The violin played plangently, evoking a sense of sadness.
小提琴凄凉地演奏，唤起一种悲伤的感觉。

sentences.sentence: The last sentence, however, was plangently clear. “Some may call it embezzlement, ” it said, “but to us it’s love.”
sentences.translation: 最后一句话，却十分的清晰，”也许有人会说这是一种盗用，“它说道，”但是对我们而言，这是爱。”
